description: The TriBeCa duplex loft that was featured in a Lena Dunham movie is set to be listed at $6.25 million.
title: A Onetime Film Set Poised to Hit the Market
title_page: A Onetime Film Set Poised to Hit the Market - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 11,
The duplex loft owned by the parents of Lena Dunham is in a six-story former textiles factory at 16 Desbrosses Street, a picturesque cobblestone block in TriBeCa two blocks east of the Hudson River. It is about to enter the market at $6.25 million. Ms. Dunham’s breakout indie film, “Tiny Furniture,” was shot there in 2009.
